ai-thag6.14:1.1_0: This two-legged body is dirty and stinking,
ai-thag6.14:1.3_0: and oozing all over the place—
ai-thag6.14:2.1_0: Like a lurking deer by a trick,
ai-thag6.14:2.2_0: like a fish by a hook,
ai-thag6.14:3.3_0: These five kinds of sensual stimulation
ai-thag6.14:3.4_0: are seen in a woman’s body.
ai-thag6.14:4.1_0: Those ordinary people, their minds full of lust,
ai-thag6.14:5.2_0: like a snake’s head with a foot,
ai-thag6.14:6.1_0: Seeing the danger of sensual pleasures,
ai-thag6.14:6.4_0: that I’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-thag6.14:6.6_0: a senior by mother and father.
ai-thag6.14:6.7_0: The Book of the Sixes is finished.
ai-thag6.14:7.0_0: The account of the thirty-six streams
ai-thag6.14:7.5_0: He is the deer range of deer,
ai-thag6.14:7.8_0: to the head pad and Sabbakāmī,
ai-thag6.14:7.10_0: But the senior monks are clearentful.
